title: McIlveen announces start of £200,000 road improvement scheme in Belfast (Northern Ireland Executive)
text: ( Source : Northern Ireland Executive ) Regional Development Minister Michelle McIlveen has announced the start of a £200, 000 road improvement scheme on Antrim Road in north Belfast ~ Thursday, 22 October 2015 The Minister confirmed the
